news.title: Irish woman (33) found dead on yacht in New York, police investigating
news.summary: Police are investigating the death of a young Irish woman in New York on Monday night.

news.title: Revenue is chasing tens of thousands of pensioners over owed tax
news.summary: The Revenue Commissioners have written to thousands of pensioners to warn of incorrect tax payments.

news.title: ‘I had to track her ashes using a code, like she was a parcel in the post’ – daughter speaks about mother’s assisted death at Swiss clinic
news.summary: The daughter of the Co Cavan-based woman who was assisted in ending her life alone at a controversial Swiss clinic has told of her sadness and disbelief after her ashes were sent home in the post.

news.title: Donald Trump pushes for end to war in Gaza as Benjamin Netanyahu plots to occupy entire Gaza Strip
news.summary: US president Donald Trump is pushing for an “all or nothing” agreement to end the war in Gaza, while Israel’s prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu wants to occupy the entire Gaza Strip, according to reports.

news.title: Great games, kick-out chaos and crowd surge: Why it was one of the best Gaelic football summers for years
news.summary: This year’s championship ended on a very familiar soundtrack as Kerry collected a 39th All-Ireland title, one that will rank right up there among the sweetest in their priceless collection.

news.title: Owners of Wexford pub which hosted surprise Ed Sheeran Fleadh gig – ‘We were sworn to secrecy, it was like MI6’
news.summary: Ed Sheeran and his crew departed the car park of the iconic Sky & The Ground pub in Wexford town to a chorus of screams from fans.

news.title: ‘I made €247,000 in tennis... so not a lot': Conor Niland on the true cost of competitive sport
news.summary: “129 - if I see that on a speedometer or 1.29pm on a digital clock, it gets my adrenaline going.”

news.title: Chloë finds a hobby: ‘I am a reformed character – I’ve finally found a class that I like’
news.summary: Readers, I have a confession. In my quest to find a hobby, I have been having the odd dalliance with another hobby behind the scenes. One which has all the luxury, glamour and ease, without making a total eejit of myself. It is Reformer Pilates.

news.title: Eoin McGee answers: ‘I’m 26 with €50k in savings and €7k in crypto. Should I invest in shares or buy a house?’
Kerry teenager dies following Bank Holiday crash
news.summary: A Kerry teenager who was seriously injured in a serious crash over the Bank Holiday weekend has passed away.
